argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zlmclm.w | |- W = ( ZMod ` G ) |
| 2 |  | clmzlmvsca.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` G ) = ( .g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_zlmvsca | |- ( .g ` G ) = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( .s ` W ) = ( .g ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` G ) = ( .s ` G ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_clmmulg | |- ( ( G e. CMod /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( .s ` W ) B ) = ( A ( .s ` G ) B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( G e. CMod /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( .s ` G ) B ) = ( A ( .s ` W ) B ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( G e. CMod /\ ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( A ( .s ` G ) B ) = ( A ( .s ` W ) B ) ) |
